thread.title: Ghost hunters claim 'prisoner's SOUL' caught floating through walls in maximum-security jail in eerie CCTV footage
thread.title_full: Ghost hunters claim 'prisoner's SOUL' caught floating through walls in maximum-security jail in eerie CCTV footage

author: Bradley Jolly
title: Ghost hunters claim 'prisoner's SOUL' caught floating through walls in maximum-security jail in eerie CCTV footage
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
This spooky footage appears to show a mysterious black spectre float through the walls of a maximum-security prison . 
Creepy CCTV captures the apparition drift up from the ground and into the jail where lags have been hanged in the past. 
Stunned staff at Campo Grande prison in Brazil raised the security alarm after mistaking the spirit for a prisoner trying to escape. 
But the eerie footage was shared on social media this week and spooked viewers are sure the spectre is a ghost. Many online believe the black spirit is the ghost of a prisoner (Photo: CorreioEstado) Read More 
"This is very much the soul of a prisoner, or its ghost," wrote one person on Facebook. 
Another posted: "U it's a ghost." 
Others dismissed the black figure as a "garbage bag". Staff at Campo Grande maximum-security jail raised the alarm after seeing the figure (Photo: CorreioEstado) 
State Penitentiary Administration Agency denied the video captured a ghost haunting the jail. 
It instead claimed the black figure was the shadow of someone moving in the slammer. 
It comes after a creepy clip appeared to catch a floating orb haunt a disused jail in Northern Ireland. Like us on Facebook
